tag.name: 00 | GA4 Tag do Google [Base e Transporte]

parameter.value:
<script>
(function() {
    var cookiesData = {
        "guimarketing_email": {{enhanced_conversion_data.email}},
        "guimarketing_phone": {{enhanced_conversion_data.phone_number}},
        "guimarketing_firstname": {{enhanced_conversion_data.firstname}},
        "guimarketing_lastname": {{enhanced_conversion_data.lastname}},
        "guimarketing_tamanho_empresa": {{enhanced_conversion_data.tamanhoempresa}},
        "guimarketing_consumo": {{enhanced_conversion_data.consumo}}
    };

    var expirationTime = 34560000 * 1000; // Um ano em milissegundos
    var date = new Date();
    var dateTimeNow = date.getTime();

    date.setTime(dateTimeNow + expirationTime);
    var expires = date.toUTCString();

    for (var cookieName in cookiesData) {
        var cookieValue = cookiesData[cookieName];
        if (cookieValue) {
            document.cookie = cookieName + "=" + cookieValue + "; SameSite=None; Secure; expires=" + expires + "; path=/; domain=.{{Constante - Domínio do Cliente}}";
        }
    }
})();
</script>

tag.name: 00 | Tag do Google ADs [Base e Transporte]

parameter.value:
<script>
 (function(){
  var cookies = [
    {name: "visitorapi.city", value: "{{dlv - visitorApiCity}}"},
    {name: "visitorapi.estado", value: "{{dlv - visitorApiEstado}}"},
    {name: "visitorapi.pais", value: "{{dlv - visitorApiCountryCode}}"}
  ];
  
  var expirationTime = 2592000 * 1000; // Um mês em milissegundos
  var date = new Date();
  var dateTimeNow = date.getTime();
  date.setTime(dateTimeNow + expirationTime);
  var expires = date.toUTCString();

  cookies.forEach(function(cookie) {
    document.cookie = cookie.name + "=" + cookie.value + "; SameSite=None; Secure; expires=" + expires + "; path=/; domain=.{{Constante - Domínio do Cliente}}";
  });
})();
</script>

<script>
var gECD = {
    'email': 'input[name="email"], input[name="e-mail"]',
    'phone_number': 'input[name="phone"], input[name="tel"], input[name="telefone"]',
    'full_name': 'input[name="name"], input[name="nome"]',
    'tamanhoempresa': 'select[name="tamanho_empresa"], select[name="tamanho"], select[name="cf_funcionarios_da_empresa"]',
    'consumo': 'select[name="consumo"]'
};
var g_countrycode = '+55';

window.enhanced_conversion_data = window.enhanced_conversion_data || {};
document.addEventListener('input', g_save_toLocalStorage);
document.addEventListener('change', g_save_toLocalStorage);

function g_save_toLocalStorage(e) {
    var input = e.target;
    for (var i in gECD) {
        if (input.matches(gECD[i])) { 
            localStorage['g_' + i] = input.value; 
            g_setup_Enhanced_Conversion_Data();
        }
    }
}

function g_setup_Enhanced_Conversion_Data() {
    for (var i in gECD) {
        if (localStorage['g_' + i]) {
            if (i == 'email' && g_validateEmail(localStorage['g_' + i])) { 
                window.enhanced_conversion_data[i] = localStorage['g_' + i]; 
            } else if (i == 'phone_number' && window.enhanced_conversion_data['email']) { 
                window.enhanced_conversion_data[i] = g_countrycode + localStorage['g_' + i].replace(/\D/g, '');
            } else if (i == 'full_name') {
                var names = localStorage['g_' + i].trim().split(/\s+/);
                window.enhanced_conversion_data['firstname'] = names[0];
                window.enhanced_conversion_data['lastname'] = names[names.length - 1];
            } else if (i == 'tamanhoempresa' || i == 'consumo') {
                window.enhanced_conversion_data[i] = localStorage['g_' + i]; 
            }
        }
    }
}

function g_validateEmail(email) {
    return /\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(email);
}
</script>

<script>
if(window.location.href.includes("/send")) {
    var googleFormMessage = "Ótima decisão!";
    (function googleFormValidation() {
        if(document.body && document.body.innerText.includes(googleFormMessage)) {
            console.log("Form has been sent successfully");
            dataLayer.push({
                'event': 'lead',
                'email': enhanced_conversion_data.email,
                'phone_number': enhanced_conversion_data.phone_number,
                'firstname': enhanced_conversion_data.firstname,
                'lastname': enhanced_conversion_data.lastname,
                'tamanhoempresa': enhanced_conversion_data.tamanhoempresa,
                'consumo': enhanced_conversion_data.consumo
            });
        } else {
            setTimeout(googleFormValidation, 500);
        }
    })();
}
</script>

<script>
(function() {
  var CONFIG = {
    prefix: 'utm_',
    expiryDays: 30,
    checkoutDomains: [
      "pay.hotmart.com", "go.hotmart.com",
      "pay.kiwify.com.br", "kiwify.com.br",
      "sun.eduzz.com", "chk.eduzz.com",
      "pay.kirvano.com", "ev.braip.com",
      "checkout.perfectpay.com.br", "pay.greenn.com.br",
      "secure.doppus.com", "pay.herospark.com",
      "pay.hub.la", "checkout.stripe.com"
    ],
    utmParams: ['utm_source', 'utm_medium', 'utm_campaign', 'utm_content', 'utm_term', 'utm_id'],
    adParams: ['fbclid', 'gclid', 'gbraid', 'wbraid', 'ttclid', 'msclkid'],
    adInference: {
      gclid: { source: 'google', medium: 'cpc' },
      gbraid: { source: 'google', medium: 'cpc' },
      wbraid: { source: 'google', medium: 'cpc' },
      fbclid: { source: 'facebook', medium: 'cpc' },
      ttclid: { source: 'tiktok', medium: 'cpc' },
      msclkid: { source: 'bing', medium: 'cpc' }
    },
    referrerMap: {
      'google': { source: 'google', medium: 'organic' },
      'bing': { source: 'bing', medium: 'organic' },
      'facebook': { source: 'facebook', medium: 'organic_social' },
      'instagram': { source: 'instagram', medium: 'organic_social' },
      'linkedin': { source: 'linkedin', medium: 'organic_social' },
      'tiktok': { source: 'tiktok', medium: 'organic_social' },
      'youtube': { source: 'youtube', medium: 'organic_video' },
      'twitter': { source: 'twitter', medium: 'organic_social' },
      'whatsapp': { source: 'whatsapp', medium: 'direct_message' }
    }
  };

  // STORAGE
  function setData(key, value) {
    try {
      var item = {
        value: value,
        expiry: Date.now() + (CONFIG.expiryDays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
      };
      localStorage.setItem(CONFIG.prefix + key, JSON.stringify(item));
    } catch(e) {}
  }

  function getData(key) {
    try {
      var raw = localStorage.getItem(CONFIG.prefix + key);
      if (!raw) return null;
      var parsed = JSON.parse(raw);
      if (Date.now() > parsed.expiry) {
        localStorage.removeItem(CONFIG.prefix + key);
        return null;
      }
      return parsed.value;
    } catch(e) {
      return null;
    }
  }

  function sanitize(str) {
    return str ? String(str).replace(/\|/g, '-').trim().substring(0, 100) : '';
  }

  function getParam(search, name) {
    var match = search.match(new RegExp('[?&]' + name + '=([^&]*)'));
    return match ? decodeURIComponent(match[1]) : null;
  }

  // CAPTURE
  function capture() {
    var search = window.location.search;
    var d = {};
    var hasData = false;
    var allParams = CONFIG.utmParams.concat(CONFIG.adParams).concat(['src', 'sck']);
    var i, val, param, inf, keys, host, key, map;

    for (i = 0; i < allParams.length; i++) {
      val = getParam(search, allParams[i]);
      if (val) { d[allParams[i]] = val; hasData = true; }
    }

    if (!d.utm_source) {
      keys = Object.keys(CONFIG.adInference);
      for (i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
        param = keys[i];
        if (d[param]) {
          inf = CONFIG.adInference[param];
          d.utm_source = inf.source;
          d.utm_medium = inf.medium;
          hasData = true;
          break;
        }
      }
    }

    if (hasData) {
      d._ts = new Date().toISOString();
      d._page = window.location.pathname;
      return d;
    }

    if (document.referrer) {
      try {
        host = document.referrer.split('/')[2].toLowerCase();
        if (host.indexOf(window.location.hostname) === -1) {
          keys = Object.keys(CONFIG.referrerMap);
          for (i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
            key = keys[i];
            map = CONFIG.referrerMap[key];
            if (host.indexOf(key) !== -1) {
              return { utm_source: map.source, utm_medium: map.medium, _ts: new Date().toISOString() };
            }
          }
          return { utm_source: host.replace('www.', ''), utm_medium: 'referral', _ts: new Date().toISOString() };
        }
      } catch(e) {}
    }
    return null;
  }

  function isPaid(d) {
    if (!d) return false;
    var i;
    for (i = 0; i < CONFIG.adParams.length; i++) {
      if (d[CONFIG.adParams[i]]) return true;
    }
    if (d.utm_medium && /cpc|ppc|paid|ads/i.test(d.utm_medium)) return true;
    return false;
  }

  // PROCESS
  function process() {
    var current = capture();
    var first = getData('first');
    var last = getData('last');
    var history = getData('history') || [];
    var lastEntry, active, isOrganic, hadAd;

    if (!first && current) {
      first = current;
      setData('first', first);
    }

    if (current) {
      last = current;
      setData('last', last);

      if (isPaid(current) || current.utm_campaign) {
        lastEntry = history[history.length - 1];
        if (!lastEntry || lastEntry.ts !== current._ts) {
          history.push({
            src: current.utm_source,
            med: current.utm_medium,
            cmp: current.utm_campaign || '',
            cnt: current.utm_content || '',
            fbc: current.fbclid || '',
            gclid: current.gclid || '',
            ts: current._ts
          });
          if (history.length > 10) history = history.slice(-10);
          setData('history', history);
        }
      }
    }

    active = last || first || {};
    isOrganic = !current || !isPaid(current);
    hadAd = history.length > 0;

    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'utm_tracking_ready',
      fc_source: (first || {}).utm_source || '',
      fc_medium: (first || {}).utm_medium || '',
      fc_campaign: (first || {}).utm_campaign || '',
      fc_content: (first || {}).utm_content || '',
      fc_fbclid: (first || {}).fbclid || '',
      fc_gclid: (first || {}).gclid || '',
      lc_source: (last || {}).utm_source || '',
      lc_medium: (last || {}).utm_medium || '',
      lc_campaign: (last || {}).utm_campaign || '',
      lc_content: (last || {}).utm_content || '',
      lc_fbclid: (last || {}).fbclid || '',
      lc_gclid: (last || {}).gclid || '',
      organic_influenced_by_ad: isOrganic && hadAd,
      total_ad_touches: history.length
    });

    return { first: first, last: last, active: active, history: history, organic_influenced: isOrganic && hadAd };
  }

  // DECORATION
  function generateSCK(d) {
    if (!d || !d.utm_source) return '';
    return [
      sanitize(d.utm_source), sanitize(d.utm_medium),
      sanitize(d.utm_campaign), sanitize(d.utm_term), sanitize(d.utm_content)
    ].join('|').replace(/\|+$/, '');
  }

  function addParam(url, key, value) {
    if (!value) return url;
    if (url.indexOf(key + '=') !== -1) return url;
    var sep = url.indexOf('?') !== -1 ? '&' : '?';
    return url + sep + encodeURIComponent(key) + '=' + encodeURIComponent(value);
  }

  function decorate(el, d) {
    if (el.getAttribute('data-utm-done')) return;
    var tag = el.tagName;
    var url = tag === 'A' ? el.href : tag === 'FORM' ? el.action : tag === 'IFRAME' ? el.src : '';
    if (!url) return;

    var isCheckout = false;
    var i;
    for (i = 0; i < CONFIG.checkoutDomains.length; i++) {
      if (url.indexOf(CONFIG.checkoutDomains[i]) !== -1) { isCheckout = true; break; }
    }
    if (!isCheckout) return;

    var allP = CONFIG.utmParams.concat(CONFIG.adParams);
    for (i = 0; i < allP.length; i++) {
      if (d[allP[i]]) url = addParam(url, allP[i], d[allP[i]]);
    }

    var sck = generateSCK(d);
    if (sck) url = addParam(url, 'sck', sck);
    if (d.utm_source) url = addParam(url, 'src', sanitize(d.utm_source));

    if (tag === 'A') el.href = url;
    else if (tag === 'FORM') el.action = url;
    else if (tag === 'IFRAME') el.src = url;

    el.setAttribute('data-utm-done', '1');
  }

  function decorateAll(d) {
    if (!d) return;
    var els = document.querySelectorAll('a, form, iframe');
    for (var i = 0; i < els.length; i++) decorate(els[i], d);
  }

  // PUBLIC API
  function createAPI(result) {
    return {
      first: result.first,
      last: result.last,
      active: result.active,
      history: result.history,
      getSCK: function() { return generateSCK(this.active); },
      getFormFields: function() {
        var fc = this.first || {}, lc = this.last || {};
        return {
          fc_source: fc.utm_source || '', fc_medium: fc.utm_medium || '',
          fc_campaign: fc.utm_campaign || '', fc_content: fc.utm_content || '',
          lc_source: lc.utm_source || '', lc_medium: lc.utm_medium || '',
          lc_campaign: lc.utm_campaign || '', lc_content: lc.utm_content || '',
          sck: this.getSCK(),
          fbclid: lc.fbclid || fc.fbclid || '',
          gclid: lc.gclid || fc.gclid || '',
          is_paid_influenced: result.organic_influenced ? 'sim' : 'nao'
        };
      },
      fillForm: function(selector) {
        var form = document.querySelector(selector);
        if (!form) return false;
        var fields = this.getFormFields();
        var keys = Object.keys(fields);
        var i, input, name, value;
        for (i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
          name = keys[i];
          value = fields[name];
          input = form.querySelector('input[name="' + name + '"]');
          if (!input) {
            input = document.createElement('input');
            input.type = 'hidden';
            input.name = name;
            form.appendChild(input);
          }
          input.value = value;
        }
        return true;
      },
      decorateURL: function(url) {
        if (!url || !this.active) return url;
        var allP = CONFIG.utmParams.concat(CONFIG.adParams);
        var i;
        for (i = 0; i < allP.length; i++) {
          if (this.active[allP[i]]) url = addParam(url, allP[i], this.active[allP[i]]);
        }
        var sck = this.getSCK();
        if (sck) url = addParam(url, 'sck', sck);
        return url;
      },
      refresh: function() { decorateAll(this.active); }
    };
  }

  // INIT
  function init() {
    var result = process();
    window.UTMTracker = createAPI(result);
    decorateAll(result.active);

    if (window.MutationObserver && result.active) {
      var timer;
      new MutationObserver(function() {
        clearTimeout(timer);
        timer = setTimeout(function() { decorateAll(result.active); }, 300);
      }).observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });
    }
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
  } else {
    init();
  }
})();
</script>
